welcomePage.description: the GraphQL integrated development environment (IDE). It’s a powerful (and all-around awesome) tool you’ll use often while building Gatsby websites. It offers syntax highlighting, intellisense autocompletion, automatic documentation, and much more.

anton.name: Anton
anton.description: Greetings, my name is Anton Zaprustski. I come from Belarus. I have graduated BNTU, faculty of information technology and robotics. Currently, I am studying at RS School. Studying is my pleasure, I enjoy uncovering new ways to improve myself.

maksim.name: Maksim
maksim.description: Hi, everybody! My main goal is to become a front-end developer. I have some experience from the 2021Q1. I am ready to work hard again, to learn another new technologies and to continue my develop.

julia.name: Julia
julia.description: Hello, my name is Yuliya. I am a self-taught front-end developer. I primarily focus on writing clean, elegant, and efficient code. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript and Type Script.
